column17: The incident occurred in the Sawaber neighborhood.
column18: 06/26/2015: A suicide bomber detonated an explosives-laden vest at the Imam Sadiq Mosque in Sawaber neighborhood, Kuwait city, Asimah governorate, Kuwait. In addition to the bomber, 27 people were killed and 227 others were injured in the blast. The Najd Province of the Islamic State claimed responsibility for the incident and stated that the mosque was targeted for spreading Shia teachings among Sunnis.
column58: Najd Province of the Islamic State
column64: The Najd Province of the Islamic State claimed responsibility for the incident and stated that the mosque was targeted for spreading Shiite teachings among Sunnis.
column97: An explosives-laden vest was used in the attack.
column108: A mosque was damaged in this attack.
column125: Casualty figures for this incident conflict across sources. Following GTD protocol, the majority reliable estimates are reported here.
column126: \\"\"2 Indians among 26 killed in suicide attack in Kuwait mosque"

column18: 02/00/2016: Sometime between February 21, 2016 and February 27, 2016, an assailant rammed his car into a group of police officers in Kuwait City, Asimah, Kuwait. At least one police officer was killed in the attack. No group claimed responsibility; however, police officers arrested Abdulaziz Al-Shamlan, a Muslim extremist, who claimed responsibility for the incident.
column82: Vehicle (not to include vehicle-borne explosives, i.e., car or truck bombs)

column18: 10/08/2016: An assailant rammed a garbage truck into a vehicle carrying United States military personnel in Kuwait. The assailant was injured in the attack. The assailant, identified as Ibrahim Sulaiman, had pledged allegiance to the Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant (ISIL).
column64: An unaffiliated individual, identified as Ibrahim Sulaiman, claimed responsibility for the incident and pledged allegiance to the Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant (ISIL).
column97: An explosives-laden garbage truck and an explosives-laden belt were used in the attack.
